title: StructuredLogEntry
description: Standard log entry schema shared across backend and frontend services.

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp in ISO 8601 format with timezone offset.

level.description: Log severity level (e.g. DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR).

component.description: Name of the service or subsystem emitting the log.

correlation_id.description: Trace or correlation identifier for linking related events.

span_id.description: Span identifier for distributed tracing systems.

context.description: Structured contextual payload containing event-specific details.

exception.description: Exception string captured when errors occur.
